1: A psalm of thanksgiving. Shout joyfully to Adonai, all the earth!
2: Serve Adonai with gladness. Come before His presence with joyful singing.
3: Know that Adonai, He is God. It is He who has made us, and we are His. We are His people, the sheep of His pasture.
4: Enter His gates with thanksgiving and His courts with praise! Praise Him, bless His Name.
5: For Adonai is good. His lovingkindness endures forever, and His faithfulness to all generations.
